title: Browser settings
pattern_match_info:
URL allows you to open in other applications, change JavaScript and UserAgent, set block
For writing, see Pattern specification
ad_block_info:
You can set up ad blocks.
For information on how to write each list, see Pattern specification.
res_interrupt_info:
check the URL and block images, external scripts, etc.
It can also be used for ad block
home_page_info:
open the specified URL when opening a new tab etc.
The default is speed dial(yuzu:speeddial)

download_type.info: You can change the behavior when downloading files etc.
download_type.auto_info: In the case of a video playback request or the like, the URL is opened by another application, and otherwise, a download dialog is displayed.
download_type.open_info: Always open the URL in another application.
download_type.select_info: Every time you receive a download request, select which behavior to open, download, and share.

search_details.engine_info: Select the search engine you have set up.
search_details.url_info:
You can set the search engine title, URL and color.
Put the search word part as '%s'
search_details.icon: Show switch icon on search bar
search_details.icon_info: You can set whether to display the search engine switching icon on the search bar.
search_details.suggest_info: Search suggestion can be set from network, past queries and both.

save_tab_info: You can set whether to save when using [exit] action
save_pin_tab_info: Save pinned tab when using [exit] action
save_closed_tab_info:
Enable when using the [Restore tab] action
If [Restore tab] is not used, it is better to disable it for memory saving
new_tab_info: Can set settings when opening a new tab
tabs_on_mem_info: Setting the upper limit of the number of tabs held in memory
pause_tab_info: Tabs stop processing when tabs enter the background
pause_browser_info: All tabs stop processing when the application enters the background
unknown_scheme_info: Try to open url by another application that is not supported a scheme (such as intent: // or twitter: //)
download_dir_info:
Specify the destination folder
Sd card is only /storage/sdcard1/Android/data/com.onevn.browser/files
auto_save_info:
Set auto save interval (sec.)
Automatic saving is not executed if it is 0 sec.
slow_rendering_info:
It is a setting to take of a full screen screenshot.
It is not recommended to enable settings other than full screen screenshots because of the likelihood of frequent freezes.
